description: System-generated unique identifier for the license record; serves as the primary key.
Legal name of the customer organization to which the license is issued.
Unique license number assigned for entitlement tracking and activation.
Structured list of licensed features and limits (e.g., module entitlements, user counts) tied to this license.
User or automated process that created the license record.
Timestamp when the license record was created.
User or automated process that last modified the license record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to the license record.
Date/time when software support or maintenance coverage for this license expires.
Software release version this license applies to; likely the major compatibility indicator; confirm with SME.
List of API resources or domains enabled under this license.
